"GBattista (hajimenokizu)" <mg_batt@...> wrote:


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Hirotada Tokugawa" 

wrote:
> "Hires the Shinsengumi to _bring down the Imperial court_?"
> 
> Oh puh-leeze. Obviously more of fiction than fact.
> 
> --M.

Well fiction has it's place... Some of us started from RK after 
all... Although the phrase is a bit outlandish, well I've heard 
worse... 

I'll be looking forward in getting my hands on something new! Thanks 
Mary-Ann!

Yeah, plus in a lot of the movies and anime I've watched (especially if they're low-budget translations) cover blurbs have little to do with what actually goes on in the film. Let's not judge it sight unseen.

Linda/enma_o
